thread.title: Janet

author: Janet
title: Janet
text:
What a find. I went in search of a special poetry book that was published in 1937. Not a well known author so the name doesn't really offer a lot of value.
I found it!! On Amazon. The price was minimal so I wasn't expecting anything spectacular. what I got was a perfectly aged, book that looks like it is 80 years old but it aged very well. In my eyes, I got perfection.
